ModMetaData.name: Early Space Colonists
ModMetaData.author: Bitbyte
ModMetaData.description:
After many years of playing rimworld, I felt like the start is a bit slow. So I made this mod which fixes that!
FEATURES: * New faction and scenario! The Early Spacer Colonists. Starts with some more research, and they come prepared, with more building materials, better weapons, and more!
* Compatible with many mods, including:
* Dubs Bad Hygiene
* Vanilla Expanded and all their expansions
* Expanded Prosthetics and Organ Engineering
* And many more...
If you encounter any bugs, please comment and tell me, and I will fix them as soon as I can. The same thing goes for mod compatability. If you have any other suggestions, please share!
